column1: gets this full delivery to move away, lands this just around off stump, Rohit leans forward and defends
good shape again, this one's at 135 clicks. Lands this just around off, fuller in length, defended with soft hands
this one's at length on middle and leg, tucked towards the vacant midwicket region
width and blasted through cover. Typical Dhawan start. Plants forward and hammers this past the infield.
late inward movement from length on middle, Dhawan plays outside the line and gets it off the inner half of the bat, towards midwicket
full and swinging down leg, Dhawan looks to flick but is hit on the pad. Ball deflects to square leg
full and swinging away from off stump, Dhawan inside-edge a cover drive to mid-on
floated full on middle and off from wide of the crease, Dhawan whips this to midwicket

looks to flay this through the line over point but can only slice this to deep third man. Pushpakumara, the debutant, takes an excellent catch on the move. The ball was flying. The bat face opened as ball met bat, the late movement did the trick for the bowler.
much fuller around off stump, eased to extra cover
nice and full just outside off, Kohli squeezes it to the of side.
punched on the up to backward point. Confident stride forward as he met the ball
squeezed wide of point for an easy single. Full and swinging away from off stump, Rohit opened the bat face to ease this wide of the fielder
lands this full on middle, Kohli whips this to midwicket. Timed well but straight to the fielder
leading edge, but wide of Malinga on his followthrough. Closed the bat face early to flick, moved a little early towards off
steers this back of length delivery to square third man to get off the mark
sprays this length ball down leg. Exercise time for the umpire. Looks like he's trying for the one that shapes away late and lost direction in the process
whipped off his hip to deep square leg
quick single. Dabs it to the man coming in from cover point, looked up towards Rohit and off they went
crunching cover drive but straight to extra cover. Not afraid to hit on the up that time
leans into this full-blooded cover drive and puts this away disdainfully. No one moved. Full and angled across, Kohli was right to the pitch of the ball as he laced this away. So good to watch
drills this off-drive past the diving mid-off fielder. This time Kohli took a step outside his crease, walked into the stroke and met it with a nice, high elbow. What power, what punch
now through the onside. Full on middle and leg, Kohli brings those powerful wrists into play as he bisects midwicket and mid-on. Stunning
hustle for pace. Bowler shortened his length, Kohli hops back and across as he defends gently
eased this between point and square third man, Kohli wanted the second but won't get it
steps out and drives on the up to mid-off
hops back to defend, this one keeps a touch low. Eased to point
what a stroke. Walks across the stumps and nonchalantly flicks this between midwicket and mid-on. All along the ground
slashed towards third man. In the air but fell well short of the fielder
back of length delivery outside off, watched through to the keeper. No deviation off the deck
this time the ball moves away gently from off stump at Ganguly's pace - 110 clicks - Rohit lets it go
balance and timing perfect as he whips this length ball using his powerful bottom hand, towards deep midwicket. There's a boundary rider
leading edge but this delivery rolls to cover. Moved away off the pitch. Well-disguised slower delivery
slower and fuller on middle, Kohli check-drives back down the pitch

the mid-on fielder Malinga took two steps to his right and decided whatever he does from there would be futile. Didn't bother to run. Kohli walks into this flick, takes it on the full and whips this past the old war horse. He's on fire
dabs this away-going length delivery to point
is there a part of the ground he can't find? Floated full on middle and off, Kohli plays a bullet drive that beats mid-off. Not much of a bat flourish but the timing is simply sensational
flays this cut but straight to the fielder
mix-up, Rohit sent back. Wanted the single as he punched it to cover.
just short of midwicket. Looked to fetch this whip from outside off, was better off punching that through cover
this time he's perfectly balanced as this incoming length ball on middle and leg is whipped towards deep midwicket. The man at deep square runs around the ropes to cut that off

'whatever you can do, I can do better,' or so Rohit seems to suggest as he disdainfully lofts a length ball inside-out over extra cover. One bounce into the fence. Once again this was sitting up nicely for Rohit to play on the up and he did in spanking fashion
waits for this length ball to slide onto the bat as he defends
driven through the line to cover, who parries this back to the bowler as he dives
drills this full ball to mid-on

second mix-up. Not for the first time are these two struggling to communicate properly while batting. Kohli has been saved by the dive here. Flicked this to square leg and took off for the single. Was late to turn but dived full stretch. All along, he also ensured the bat didn't plonk up at any stage
cracking drive to wide long-off
drifting into middle and leg, worked to deep midwicket
firm drive to long-off again, got a good stride forward again
back of length delivery, just around off stump, defended gently
steers this length ball to square third man
shows the full face of the bat and eases this one back to the bowler
he's clobbered that over the deep midwicket boundary. Pulled imperiously off the frontfoot. Too short, a crime at his pace.
closer to the stumps at length, bunted to the off side
cry of anguish from Rohit as he mistimes this cut to point. Cramped for room
driven firmly into the gap between wide long-off and deep cover
steps out and plays this whip past the bowler. Hit so hard and so straight that the umpire had to take evasive action. This brushed the stumps as it raced past.
misfield at cover by Kusal Mendis. That's headed to the cover boundary. Tossed up outside off, Kohli hammered that
smashed back down the ground, this time it hits the stumps and deflects to long-off.
shorter in length, drifting into middle and leg, punched to long-on
works this in-drifter straight to Malinga at wide mid-on
slower delivery angling into middle and leg, worked behind square as they jog the single
skiddy bouncer which Kohli has top-edged to the fine leg boundary. Tried to keep it down, too his eye off the ball but did well to go through with the shot
slower delivery down leg. Kohli looks to tickle this fine but misses.
much fuller on the pads, another slower ball at 109kph, flicked to deep square leg
dabs this gently towards third man. Another off-cutter at 108kph. Malinga is dealing with off-cutters only at the moment
another slower ball, another wide. Slipped out of his hand. This is a tired show so far from Malinga.
gentle little dab behind square towards point, Mb> half-century in style, his 45th in ODIs
bouncer on middle, Rohit controls the pull nicely, down to deep backward square leg
works this from outside off towards midwicket
tossed up on off stump, Rohit lunges forward and blocks
tucked towards square leg, call was for two, managed to finish it quite comfortably.
punched down to long-on for an easy single
this time it's the legbreak, worked across the line towards wide long-on
nurdled behind square on the leg side
touch short outside off, punched to deep point
defended from the crease. This drifted in and spun away from length on middle
unfurls a classy drive, opened his wrists nicely to ease that toward deep cover
touch short and way outside off, punched across the line to long-on
clever. Saw the width and then glided this away late to beat short third man. He's shown his muscle, now for the deft touches
crunched to cover, a half-stop by Thirimanne keeps it to a single
gets to the pitch of the ball and drives this sweetly to wide long-off
nicely flighted on middle, Rohit gets forward and defends
punches this wrong'un to midwicket, good work by the fielder
googly again, Rohit was playing for the one that spins away. Cramped for room as he blocks
dropped short but Rohit had already made up his mind that he'll step out to hit whatever it was. Pulled over midwicket. Easily done

shouts of catch, but the fielder can only watch it sail over the deep midwicket stands. Nicely tossed up outside off, Rohit is quickly down on one knee as he sweeps powerfully. Wow, is there a contest between these two or what, for who plays the better shots today?
poor effort by Pushpakumara at deep cover results in a boundary. Drilled that full delivery, the fielder was late to pick the ball in the sun, ran the wrong way initially
short outside off, Kohli gets outside the line of the stumps and flatbats this to the midwicket boundary. Are they having a net or what?
yorker length on off stump, squeezed to the off side
crashed to the man at deep cover, hitting them really hard
full outside off, Rohit wrists this down to long-on
right to the pitch of the ball as he works this down to long-on
works this full delivery on middle and leg towards long-on
full outside off, works down to long-on. Become a favourable area for both of them
steps out, right to the pitch of the ball as he hammers this over long-on. No holding back. This is beast mode batting. Excellent use of the feet, right into his swinging arc
flatter on middle, whipped towards deep midwicket
edged, races past short third man. Gingerly effort from Mathews, wasn't far from him but he never looked like getting there. Only positive was he got him to drive
gets a good stride forward and eases this with the spin to short cover
flatter on middle and leg, turned to midwicket
gets a good stride forward and eases this full delivery to midwicket
tucked wide of midwicket this time, Rohit immediately puts his hand out, as if to tell Kohli 'don't even try for a second'
makes room and punches this short ball to cover
goes over extra cover. Mid-off inside the ring, so Rohti makes a bit of room and lofts this inside-out with the turn. Lovely
tucked towards the vacant midwicket region for an easy single
flat and fullish on off stump, uses his wrists to clip it down to long-on
back of a length, slides on towards off stump, goes back and across and punches to long-on
tossed up on off stump, driven inside-out to short extra-cover
slow and shortish, close to off stump, goes on the back foot to whip it down to long-on
flatter now, slanting into middle stump. Looks to work it against the turn and the ball rolls to the bowler off a thickish leading edge
full on middle and off, driven to long-off
tossed up on off stump, clipped to short midwicket
flat offbreak on off stump, goes on the back foot to punch to long-on
a bit of flight and dip on middle stump, gets a nice stride out to clip to long-on and bring up his fifty
tossed up outside off, another offbreak, clipped to long-on
short, wide, and that's easily put away. Waited a long time and delayed his cut slightly to make sure it ran away a long way to the left of the sweeper
flatter and fuller on middle stump, clipped into the backward square leg region
tossed up slow on off stump. Looks for the inside-out drive to sweeper cover and Hasaranga cuts it off with a dive to his left from short extra
tossed up slightly wider, and this time he gets his driven single to the sweeper
full on off stump, clipped to long-on
flighted ball wide of off, this time he drives to the left of the man at sweeper cover
fired in on middle and leg, clipped past the non-striker to long-on. Rohit had to jump to evade it
flat on middle and leg, clipped to short midwicket
starts with a flat short ball on off stump and Kohli swats it down to long-on
full, close to off stump, gets on the front foot to ease it to sweeper cover
full on middle stump and that's a stunning shot. Loads of bottom hand, and the back leg goes up in a prance, as he whips this away to the left of midwicket
length ball on off stump, defended into the covers
flat, back of a length, close to off stump. Waits on it and dabs towards short third man

muted lbw appeal as Rohit misses the sweep. Slanted in flat, and it didn't turn enough to be hitting the stumps. Sliding down leg. Ball-tracking says clipping leg stump, but on first glance it seemed to be missing comfortably
shortish on off stump, goes back to punch to deep midwicket
tossed up slow, pitching on middle and turning away a touch. Gets his head over the ball to drive it back to the bowler
back of a length, this one slides on with the angle and cramps Rohit. Defended back down the pitch
full on leg stump, clipped through square leg
flat, slanting into the pads, clipped to deep midwicket
full on leg stump, clipped to square leg
back of a length, angling into the pads, flicked through backward square leg
flat length ball angling into leg stump. Shows a straight bat and punches to midwicket
full on off stump, driven to sweeper cover
flat and full on middle and leg, whipped to long-on
fullish on off stump, brings his wrists into play for a whippy drive to sweeper cover
flat, angling into leg stump, no turn. Goes on the back foot to punch to long-on

nice flight on off stump, dips a little and forces Rohit to adjust. Wanted to drive into the covers. Had to wait, open his bat face, and steer towards backward point instead. Such have been the small, unnoticed victories for the bowlers today
back of a length on leg stump, punched down to long-on
a bit of flight on off stump, driven inside-out to short extra
back of a length, slides on towards middle stump, goes back to punch to long-on
drops short on off stump, and that's easily put away, rocks back, makes some room, and cuts it away to the right of backward point. No chance for sweeper cover on this outfield

oh my. That's some serious timing. Jumped out of his crease to the flighted ball on off stump, skipped inside the line, and just lifted it inside-out over extra-cover. Just kept soaring and just cleared the boundary
bam, and just like that he has a 76-ball hundred. A short ball angling into his legs, and he just whips it, an effortless shot, one bounce and over the square leg boundary
back of a length on off stump, swatted down to long-on
tossed up on off and middle, driven to long-off
down the track and Siriwardana shortens his length slightly, outside off. Shows the full face to push to long-off
another boundary, and he's manufactured this. Full outside off, and he drives with an open face, deliberately slices it to the left of the diving fielder at backward point
a bit of turn. Flat and quick, angling into middle stump. Goes back, looking for the leg-side flick, and then he adjusts as this rips away towards off stump, defends into the covers instead
and Kohli says 'how do you do' by stepping forward to a length ball on off stump and driving it high over long-off. Wow
length ball close to off stump, presses forward, lets it come on, and dabs to the left of backward point
back of a length close to off stump, lets it come on and dabs to third man
full on the pads, and Kohli flicks to the right of midwicket. As soon as it beats the diving fielder, that's four on this outfield. Deep square leg has no chance
down the track and Vishwa bowls full on middle stump. Shows the full face and drives to long-off to bring up India's 200
length ball on off stump, lets it come on and dabs to the left of backward point. Kohli is quick to respond to Rohit's call and the single is achieved easily
length ball on the pads, clipped to deep square leg
flighted offbreak pitching on a good length outside off. Stretches out, lets it come on, and dabs towards backward point
flat offbreak turning into middle and leg, shows a straight bat to defend to midwicket
a bit of turn and bounce on this offbreak as Rohit comes forward to work it leg side. Hits the glove and rolls towards short fine leg
short, wide, and Kohli misses out, cuts too close to Malinga at backward point
goes back to a length offbreak pitching just outside off, punches it down to long-on

full, angling into off stump, and just as the Premadasa was about to roar in approval to greet a rare dot ball, Malinga misfields at mid-on after Kohli whips the ball to him. The single takes the partnership to 200
length ball wide of off stump, reaches out to steer it to deep point
full-toss, just below waist height, angling into the batsman as he jumps down the track. Just clears his front leg and swipes it away to the left of midwicket
short and wide, slapped to the right of sweeper cover
bangs it in short, gets it to rise towards Kohli's right shoulder. He plays a tennis-style pull, swatting the ball downwards to the left of deep square leg
another short ball, this one doesn't get up as high, Kohli pulls once more to the left of deep square leg, not as far wide of the fielder as the previous ball
down the track and he fires it in full at Kohli's feet. Whips it to the left of deep square leg, and Hasaranga, one of Sri Lanka's best fielders, overruns the ball and lets it run through for four
fired in flat on off stump, blocked back to the bowler
down the track and Dananjaya bowls an offbreak at his pads. Clipped towards deep square leg
tossed up on off stump, mid-off is in the circle, and Rohit extends his arms through a lofted drive and scoops it high over that fielder
down the track and Dananjaya gets an offbreak to turn sharply at Rohit, hits his pad and it rolls to short fine leg
flat offbreak that cramps Rohit a little as he goes on the back foot to work it leg side. Has to play it finer than he'd like, to the man at short fine leg
full outside off, almost a yorker, jabbed to short extra-cover
once again, very full, just outside off, this time Kohli stabs it towards backward point. Rohit wanted one but Kohli sent him back, wisely. Hasaranga closed in very quickly

gone! Malinga has his 300th wicket! Not the greatest delivery he's ever bowled, but he won't mind - he's found a way to break this partnership. A full, wide ball, and Kohli drives in the air, straight to the sweeper on the cover point boundary
length ball, nips in a little towards off stump as he comes forward to push into the covers. Inside-edge rolls into the square-leg region
low full-toss on the pads, an attempted yorker, and Rohit just shows it the full face, finds the gap to the right of mid-on, and sends it racing away for another boundary
length ball close to off stump, defended into the covers
tossed up on off stump, and that's nearly another wicket. Goes for the big hit, takes on the fielder at long-on, and he's lucky he's hit that flat. Bounces some five yards short of the fielder
length ball turning in towards middle stump, tucked away through square leg
wrong'un first up. Stretches out and defends, manages to overcome some extra bounce
bam. Down the track to another wrong'un, flighted outside off, and gets to the pitch to flat-bat it hard to the bowler's left

down the track again, and that's given! Doesn't get anywhere near the pitch this time, Dananjaya saw him coming and bowled a flatter, shorter googly. Jabbed at it with hard hands, and the appeal was for a bat-pad catch at short leg. Pandya reviews. Looks like it might have turned past the inside edge and just lobbed up off the front pad. Pandya survives. They check for lbw as well - it says umpire's call on height, and it also says he was more than 3m down the pitch. If it's umpire's call, how is it not out? Unless the umpire made some sort of communication that he was giving it out caught and not lbw. It was also umpire's call for impact, whether or not it was in line with off stump. I'm really not sure about this one.
another googly, drops onto a nice length, stretches out to defend to midwicket
slower offcutter, turning in towards the pads. Clipped quietly into the leg side

back of a length on off and middle, punches it with a straight bat and Thirimanne at midwicket, diving left, gets his body behind it but doesn't fully get it under control, allowing the batsmen to run a single
full on leg stump, clipped to midwicket
slower ball on middle stump, goes on the back foot and works it to the right of square leg
yorker on middle and leg, clipped towards square leg. Took Pandya by surprise there, a bit of inward reverse too
short on off stump, pulled to the right of long-on
ooh, nearly. This has been a nervy innings so far. Short legbreak outside off, looks for the pull and inside-edges it past his off stump.
wrong'un, and I don't know if he picked it or just went for it after seeing its trajectory. Tossed up high outside off, and he gets down on one knee to slog-sweep hard and high over wide long-on
another googly, short enough for Pandya to make some room and chop it away to the right of backward point
flat, shortish offbreak turning in towards leg stump, punched with a straight bat to long-on
length ball turning in towards off stump, clipped away through midwicket
tossed up on middle stump, swept to deep backward square leg
slower and fuller on the pads, flicked to deep backward square leg
length ball snaking into middle and leg, punched to midwicket
dipping full toss on middle and leg, Pandya was looking to biff this over midwicket, ended up turning it with the angle to the fielder there. Completely deceived

belts this full toss past mid-on to bring up back-to-back ODI centuries. His 13th overall and fourth against Sri Lanka. Reckon there's time for a double? His wife is more expressive than the man himself. Has been a class knock
sways out of the way of that skiddy bouncer outside off
helps this short ball down to the fine leg boundary. Just lent direction to it. Easy
dropped, Akila Dananjaya the culprit. This was drilled to him at cover. Got his hands on it, hit the palm and bobbled out. Should have been taken. Oh, dear. That could prove costly
punches this length ball back to the bowler

this time, he's picked out the man at deep midwicket. Walked across the stumps to fetch the pull, this was a slower delivery so he had to force the pace. Hit it well but found the fielder. Pandya has a look of disbelief, as if to say 'how did I find the fielder.' His father is a picture of disappointment in the stands. The Dananjaya drop doesn't prove costly, after all

has he feathered this? Yes he has. Two in two. Looks to arch back and glide this short ball over the keeper's head but the lack of pace has done him in. Just ends up being a straightforward catch to the keeper. Rohit started walking  immediately. Double-strike for Sri Lanka courtesy a man with wonky knees.
nearly had one. Pandey look to pull but this got big on him and whizzed past the shoulder of the bat. Lucky break
bunts this length ball straight to point
right to the pitch of the ball as he eases this to deep cover to get off the mark
lunges forward and squeezes this past cover
slow turn from outside off, this keeps a touch low, Pandey behind the line in defence
nicely tossed up on off stump, this one dipped on him, Pandey checks his shot and defends
gets a good stride forward and blocks this tossed up delivery on off stump
floated full on off stump, Rahul sweetly times this into the gap at cover
crunching drive to the sweeper at cover
flat-bats this pull towards deep midwicket
the length ball straightens after pitching on middle, Rahul, initially looking to work this wide of midwicket, offers the full face of the bat in defence
slower and fuller outside off, eased behind square on the off side as they jog the single
eased down to mid-on as they complete the single rather easily. Malinga didn't even bother running in to prevent it
on middle, milked to long-on
sharp turn into middle and leg, worked towards fine leg
tossed up outside off, Pandey square drives to the sweeper

chipped straight to midwicket. The freefall continues. Rahul's third failure in the series, out to Dananjaya again. This was the wrong'un that didn't spin as much, Rahul picked it and looked to hit it with the spin but he was trying to do so from outside off, only managed to hit it straight to the fielder.

lobs off the pad to short leg. The fielder instinctively has a shy at the stumps at the bowler's end as Pandey's bat was in the air. The throw is wide, but there's no one backing up. Runs away to the boundary there. Bizarre
eases this tossed up delivery to long-on to get off the mark
eases this length ball to backward point
angles a full delivery on middle from wide of the crease, defended
nearly chipped back to the bowler. Stopped on Dhoni as he looked to ease this down the ground, checked his shot at the last moment
forced off the backfoot to cover
appeal for lbw but that was going down leg. This length ball was angling in from wide of the crease. Dhoni looked to work this wide of midwicket
defended solidly. This length ball on off held its line. Another maiden from Mathews
drifts into middle and leg, Pandey eases this wide of square leg
low full toss, played down to long-off
gets a good stride forward and drives this to deep cover
nicely tossed up on off, Dhoni stretches a long way forward and defends
steps out, walks into the drive, down to long-off
driven wide of cover, down to the man in the deep
flatter one on middle from around the stumps, worked to midwicket
slow turn from off stump, Pandey walks across and blocks
eased with the spin to cover. Pressure building
drilled back to the bowler. Timed well but can't pick the gap
eased down to long-on
looks to step out but resists temptation, this one spins away sharply to beat the outside edge. The backfoot is dragged back into the crease
steps out and whips this full toss from outside off to the midwicket boundary. That should make him feel better. Nicely timed. The footwork made it into a full toss
right to the pitch of the ball as he eases this to sweeper cover
steps out and nurdles this with the angle to midwicket, the fielder running in from the deep was caught napping. Back for the second without breaking into a sweat. Too easy
steps out, the bowler drops it short, Dhoni pushes it to point
hammered flat to long-off, don't think that's what he wanted though. Looked to smash this over the ropes
cut away to deep cover. Not all that short
rank long hop. Short and sliding down leg, Pandey uses the depth of the crease to helps this pull into the deep backward square leg boundary
too full on middle and leg, eased to long-on
steps out and dabs this full ball back to the bowler
drifting down leg, Dhoni paddles this fine. Used the pace of the bowler effectively. That was fired in. 300 up for India
too short, pulled to the man at deep square
drifting into middle and leg, punched to deep midwicket
low full toss tailing into the pads, worked to deep midwicket
fires this wide outside off, flirting with the wide line. Anticipated Dhoni to walk into the stroke but he stayed put
much fuller and just outside off, squeezed to extra cover
another yorker, another squeeze to the off side. Dhoni is standing deep inside the crease precisely for this
too full, too wide, another run. Malinga's tryst with waywardness continues today. Looked to spear this just inside the wide line, lost control.
gets it right this time, yorker-length delivery outside off, Dhoni toe-ends the drive to long-off
dabs this slower delivery to square third man
full, wide and he's squeezed this into the gap towards deep point. Just opened the bat face late to slice this away
yorker-length delivery angling away, steered wide of point
mistimes an across-the-line slog back to the bowler. Toe-ended this. Nicely bowled by Vishwa, angled this full and wide as he saw Dhoni trying to line up the leg side
drills this length ball outside off to deep cover
deliberately done, beautiful. There was a widish first slip but Pandey manages to use this angle - full and wide on off - to carve this between that man and the keeper.
walks across the stumps and whips this down to long-on, was halfway down the pitch when the midwicket fielder dived over the ball
sees Pandey walking across the stumps and spears in a slow off-cutter. Pandey is beaten as he looks to dab this down to third man. Wasn't far from the bat, but it's still been called wide. Harsh call
slower and fuller on off, Pandey whips this down to deep midwicket
full toss outside off, Dhoni reaches out to ease this to deep cover
drills this but can't find the gap. Straight to Pushpakumara at cover. A metre on either side and it was four.

lands straight on the advertising skirting or has it landed just before? No more than a millimeter. This was full and wide outside off, Dhoni gets underneath the delivery and smokes this inside-out over cover.
bunts this between cover and point
sweeps this from way outside off to deep square leg
delightfully done by Pandey. Lines himself to go over cover, executes it superbly. Cleared his front leg and got underneath the full delivery as he found the sweet spot. Whack
square driven into the gap between deep cover and deep point. Opened the face of the bat ever-so-slightly to find the gap
full and angling away, Pandey walks across the stumps and works this towards the man coming in from deep midwicket
punches this high full toss to deep cover.
sashays down the pitch and flat-bats this stroke down past the bowler, long-off and long-on converge. Uncharacteristic, Pandey style

Dropped! Munaweera makes a right royal mess at point. Dhoni miscues a slog, slices this swirler. Munaweera callee for it, but his eyes closed just as it landed on his palm. Looked so ugly on the replay. Dhoni was looking to belt this leg side
slower on middle and leg, Pandey works this into the gap at deep backward square leg. Bringing those supple wrists into play
dabs this slower delivery to third man
slaps this short ball on off to deep point, Dananjaya takes ages to get around the ropes to stop that
this has been clobbered to the P Sara Oval! Anticipates the slower ball, lines himself up to clear deep midwicket and does so effortlessly. Picked the slower one off the hand in a jiffy
full and wide outside off, Dhoni drills this flat hit to sweeper cover
yorker-length outside off, squeezed to deep point
looks to walk across and slog but the bowler sees him doing that and fires this full and wide, Dhoni can't get underneath that

wow, this is superb. Brute force of Dhoni leaves the man at wide long-off just watching it race to the boundary. He was looking to muscle this to the on side but the full toss was waist-high, just lent direction
top work by Kusal Mendis at deep cover. Full and wide outside off, drilled to the man at sweeper cover
looks like there was no edge. This was full and angling away, Dhoni looked to deflect this wide of the keeper.
squeezes this yorker-length delivery to the man at the edge of the ring at cover
that is a Dhoni special. He was standing on off stump so Malinga fired this full and wide, Dhoni got right towards the delivery and tonked this to deep extra cover. What hand speed
yorker-length outside off, squeezed to point
squeezes this full and wide delivery to the man coming in from deep extra cover, excellent running
slices this full and wide delivery to point

right into the blockhole, Dhoni squeezes this straight hit to long-on. Dhoni wanted the second but Pandey sent him back, perhaps realising he wouldn't make it in time. Good work by Thirimanne. 100 partnership up
whips this full delivery to midwicket, there's a half-century for Pandey.
gets this to nip back in quickly. Skidded back at 138kph, Dickwella chops this down to third man. Good start
excellent short ball, at 139 clicks this one. Munaweera goes back onto his toes and fends that one away
Play and a miss. Looks to back away and slap this over cover. Thakur shortened his length, this one nipped away off the seam as well.
beauty of a delivery. Jags away off the deck to beat Munaweera as he looks to push at one away from the body
back of length delivery outside off, punched to Axar at short cover
off the mark with a lovely backfoot punch. Stood tall and got into good position as he pierced the gap in the off side
whips this length ball on the pads to the deep backward square leg boundary. Had the Jayasuriya stamp all over it
excellent comeback. Angles a full delivery across Dickwella, who is beaten. Drove outside the line of that delivery
tremendous! Nothing wrong with the delivery. Length on middle and Dickwella brings his bottom hand into play to whip this over midwicket. Superb timing
full and swinging down leg, even Dhoni can't get across in time to stop that. Five wides. Bumrah was looking for a yorker-length delivery perhaps
slower length ball that stops on him just a touch, defended without  hassle though
looks to ramp this away-going short ball over the cordon, but the ball moved away late to beat the bat
slower delivery floated across the right-hander, eased down to square third man
short-arm jab, that has rocketed to the square leg boundary. Walked across the stumps and rolled his wrists over the delivery. Sped away
floats this full and across the left-hander, too wide. Bowled at 144kph
that is a brute of a delivery. Hit the length area on off and just reared up on Dickwella. Whizzed past the edge. 148 kph on that one!
sees the batsman looking to back away and fires this wide outside off, left alone

first ODI wicket for Shardul. Not the kind of delivery he would've liked to get it, but he's off the mark nonetheless. Skiddy length ball on leg stump and going further down, Dickwella looks to tickle this fine but the ball brushes his gloves on the way through to Dhoni. He's good with his reviews. Raveendra Wimalasiri was the umpire in question.
excellent follow-up delivery. Gets this to curve away just a wee bit from off stump, Kusal is solid in defence
beaten again. Played with minimal feet movement
snakes in a length ball that nips away off the seam from off stump, defended
comes back in with the angle to thud into his thigh pad. Munaweera played all around that one
goes back and across as he defends this length ball on off
solid in defence again. Right behind the line of that incoming length ball
off a thick inside edge to square leg, Rahul fires a throw at the striker's end but missed
slower delivery in that off stump channel, left alone
edged, down to third man. Flew off the blade as he played inside the line
goes for an expansive cut but can't get any bat to it. Didn't have as much room
late on the stroke again. Looks to stand tall and force this off the backfoot, chopped to Dhoni off the inside edge
beaten! Gets this to zip away off the deck from length around off. Looked to smack that on the up
driven on the up, down to Rahane, the substitute fielder, at square third man
hops back into the crease and whips this length ball to deep square leg
beaten! Looks to drive on the up but the ball deviated late.

KL Rahul with a direct hit at the bowler's end from point. Kusal Mendis had given up. Terrible, terrible mix-up. This was bunted to point, Kusal was halfway down the pitch when he turned back. In all fairness, Munaweera was never really thinking of the run and said no immediately. Kusal has paid the price for his error in judgment.
superb timing. This flies off the bat. Rahul gives it chase from point and pulls it back. Delightful backfoot punch
angles a length ball on middle from wide of the crease, defended
appeal for lbw but this was going down leg. He was overbalanced as he looked to work this with the angle
angles in a fuller delivery on the stumps, eased to mid-on
back of length delivery on middle and leg, worked off his hip to square leg
angles a length ball across the left-hander, defended confidently by Thirimanne
lovely drive on the up. Between cover and point. Elegant and graceful. Had the width and he put it away with ease
defends the full-length delivery back to the bowler
gets on top of the bounce and bunts this short of length delivery to the off side
length ball way down leg. Dhoni does the needful
hops back and across as he defends the short of length delivery back down the pitch
beaten! Full ball on off, nips away ever-so-slightly to whizz past the outside edge.
lofted through the line, clears mid-off. Not off the middle but he'll take the runs anyway
back of length on middle and off, Munaweera is right behind the line as he blocks
looks to pull but the ball slides back in to hit him on the right thigh. Kept a touch low as well
mistimes this hit through the line to mid-off

angles in a short of length delivery on middle and leg, Munaweera is on the hop as he looks to tickle this fine and gets a faint glove on it through to Dhoni. So another review that has gone in India's favour. Munaweera's inglorious debut is over. Looked to play a shot at every delivery, didn't connect half of those.
full and just on middle, shapes back in a touch, Thirimanne gets a thick inside-edge to mid-on
works this length ball off his hip to midwicket
beaten by a beauty! Left him late. Thirimanne played away from the body, poked at that. This one nipped away off the seam
hops back and steers this short ball down to third man
slower and fuller on off stump, defended back down the pitch
works this full delivery from middle to short midwicket
back of length on middle and leg, worked to midwicket
solid in defence, plants half-forward and eases the length delivery to the off side
bunts this to mid-off as they scamper a quick single
short of length outside off, this keeps a touch low, steered to point
skiddy short ball on middle, Mathews avoids that in the nick of time. Was looking away, not the best technique but it works for him
edged but just short of Rohit at second slip. They take a run as it wasn't stopped cleanly
bouncer on middle, Mathews avoids it again
thick inside edge, rolls wide of square leg. Dhoni jogs around to stop that. It was banged in short by Pandya
width on offer, punched to sweeper cover
sways out of the way of that short delivery outside off
floats a slower delivery on middle and leg, worked to deep square leg
shot of the evening. Manish Pandey does superbly well at deep cover to cut off that crunching drive
slower and fuller on off, drives the low full toss to long-off
drifts in a full ball on middle from wide of the crease, eased to deep midwicket
driven back to Kohli. He's bowled all deliveries full and straight. The pace is down, maybe he's trying to trade that for accuracy
full toss on middle, punched to long-on
another full toss, driven to long-off
floated on the pads, flicked to Rohit, who pulls off a one-handed stop at midwicket
back of length delivery on off stump, this one keeps a touch low, punched to extra cover
slower and fuller on off stump, pushed to cover again
short ball on the stumps, Mathews hops across and nurdles this down to fine leg
looks to help this over the cordon but this bouncer was just outside his reach
whipped uppishly, but just short of midwicket
gives him the charge but Pandya bangs it in short and across Thirimanne, who can't get any bat on the pull
floats this full delivery on middle and leg, worked behind square on the leg side
whipped into the gap at deep backward square leg. Short and into middle and leg, lovely flick of the wrists. Bisected square leg and short fine
again beats the man at short fine leg. Tripe delivery. Short and sliding down leg, helped along nicely
has he got him? Saved by an inside-edge perhaps? Height in question. Nipped back in sharply to hit him on the flap of the pad. Would've missed leg too
right behind the line of the ball in defence
back of length, just around off, bunted back down the pitch
tossed up on off stump, driven to long-off
dips onto a nice length on off stump as Mathews presses forward, blocks it back to the bowler
a bit fuller, on off stump, clipped to deep midwicket
greets Thirimanne with the wrong'un, pitching on a good length and spinning back towards off stump. Reads it well and defends off the front foot, into the covers
a touch short on off stump, makes room to slap to deep point
length ball on middle and leg, clipped into the square leg region
back of a length on off stump, defended into the covers
short, some width too, but an uncertain shot from Mathews. Could have gone after it with the square cut. Elects to poke at it instead, no footwork, and the ball beats his outside edge
length ball on middle and leg, tucked to the right of midwicket for one
shortish, angling into the body as he shuffles across. Tucks it off his hip through backward square leg
bouncer, and Thirimanne hooks it all the way. Climbed up quite steeply, towards his front shoulder, but he swivelled quickly and middled it. Went in the air but safely to the left of fine leg
and he's gone next ball! Not a wicket-taking ball by any means, short and wide, but he slashes in the air, and only a few yards to the right of Dhawan at deep point
flight goes a little wrong, a full-toss outside off that Mathews puts away with a drive to the left of the diving extra-cover fielder
length ball on middle stump, worked away through square leg
tossed up on off stump, driven to short extra-cover
back of a length, the googly turning in towards off stump, goes back and blocks into the covers
flighted ball on leg stump, gets his front leg out of the way and drives back to the bowler

nicely bowled. Slows it up and tosses it up outside off. Goes for the drive but doesn't get close enough to the pitch, and doesn't pick the googly. Rolls into the on side off the inside half of his bat
short, a bit of width, and that's nicely punched away, gets onto his toes to place it to the right of backward point and a long way to the left of deep point
again some width, this time he goes at it with more of a flat-bat stroke, hits it in front of square to the man at deep point
lovely. A slower ball outside off, quite full, and it also swings away from Mathews, who drives away from his body and misses by a long way
digs it in short, outside off, and Mathews does well to drag his pull from there, get on top of the bounce, and beat the man at deep square leg to his left
looks for another slower ball, this one ends up slipping down the leg side, past Mathews' attempted flick
back of a length outside off, lets it come on and dabs to the right of backward point
short and wide, slapped to deep point
tossed up on off stump, driven back to the bowler
a little flatter, pitches on middle stump, drops onto a lovely length, defended into the covers
fullish on off stump, defended to short cover
a little wider, presses forward and opens his bat face to steer towards backward point
a touch shorter, makes room to punch the googly through cover point
tossed up nicely on middle and off, looks to clip to long-on but midwicket moves quickly to his left to intercept
back of a length, turning in towards middle stump, punched to long-on
full now, fairly wide of off, comes forward to drive to mid-off
length ball sliding on towards off stump, defended into the covers
flighted length ball outside off, good stride forward to push to mid-off
flat, shortish, sliding on towards off stump, punched to long-off, who's just been moved back. Not sure which fielder moved into the circle
swept away, took that from in front of off stump and got his head right over the ball to hit it to the left of deep backward square leg
length ball on middle stump, gets a good stride forward to clip into the square leg region
flight and dip outside off, and he drives slightly on the up to the right of sweeper cover
full and flighted on leg stump, clipped to the right of square leg
googly, dropping onto a good length close to off stump and spinning into the left-hander. Defended off the front foot towards point
shot. Picks the right moment to step out, gets his front leg out of the way as Kuldeep straightens his line, and lofts cleanly over mid-on
tossed up wider, stretches out to play a sliced drive towards backward point
speared in flat, angling down leg. Misses the flick and the ball rolls off the outside of his pad towards short fine leg
again, onto the pads, clipped to square leg
nicely bowled, a bit of drift away from the left-hander, and he comes forward to defend, plays slightly inside the line and it turns less than expected to beat his outside edge
straighter now, whipped away to deep midwicket
length ball sliding in towards middle stump, clipped through square leg
tossed up full on off stump, almost a yorker, jabbed into the covers
well bowled. Didn't pick the googly, looked to work this leg side, from the crease, and the ball hit the leading edge and rolled into the covers
fuller now, clipped to deep midwicket
length ball on middle and off, defended into the off side
dangled up wide of off stump, driven to point with an open bat face

a bit of inward drift, dip and then turn towards off stump. Defended towards backward point, and then he thinks of taking a single. The fielder comes in, picks up and flicks underarm to Dhoni, who coolly deflects the ball onto the stumps with his glove, but he was safely home
back of a length outside off, chopped towards backward point
flat, slanting into middle stump, shuffles across to work it through square leg
flat again, close to off stump, goes on the back foot to punch into the covers
goes slightly fuller with his length, presses forward to dab into the point region
flat and full, angling into middle and off from wide of the crease. Gets forward to block into the off side
not full enough to drive through the covers, and the inward angle forces him to flat-bat it back towards the bowler, who stops it with a dive to his left

a shot in anger after a bit of a lull. The length is similar to the previous ball, but the line is a little closer to off stump, and he slog-sweeps over wide mid-on. Didn't quite middle it, but cleared mid-on quite easily and then beat his attempt to chase back and stop the boundary
lovely flight and dip, pitches on middle and spins away sharply. Nowhere near the pitch to drive inside-out, and he checks his shot and sends it slightly uppishly into the covers
ripper. This one pitches on that beautiful length again, on off stump, and is quicker this time. Spins away sharply to beat his defensive push
a touch shorter now, can go back and punch to sweeper cover
shortish, turning in towards the pads as Mathews goes back and across, clips towards short fine leg, who stops it with a dive to his right
looped up slow outside off, swept to deep square leg
googly, pitching on middle and turning away from Mathews, who stretches out, reads it well, and defends back to the bowler
flat, angling down leg, Siriwardana can't connect with the paddle-sweep
not short enough for that forcing shot off the back foot. Makes room and the ball beats his outside edge
this one is short, on off stump, and he rocks back and pulls to the square leg boundary to bring up the fifty partnership
flat on the pads, clipped to deep midwicket
length ball wide of off, driven on the up and the man at point dives right to stop it
length ball on off stump, driven back to the bowler
and again. I think he was playing for turn, looking for the drive to long-off, but it didn't turn, and he ended up hitting it back to the bowler off the inside half of the bat
back of a length close to off stump, slanting across the left-hander. Dabbed towards backward point
full outside off, opens his bat face to drive to deep point
short ball, sits up outside off and he pulls it away to the left of midwicket
back of a length close to off stump, shuffles across and works it to deep square leg
short, some width, and Siriwardana slaps it away, beats deep point running to his left. Not the greatest over from Pandya, this
back of a length on middle stump, blocked back to the bowler
flat length ball sliding down leg. Misses the flick, but gets a helpful tickle on it, off pad, to beat the keeper and send the ball rolling away to the right of short fine leg
flat length ball angling into off stump, defended to short extra-cover
length ball wide of off, and again, the angle and length ensure Mathews plays it back to the bowler rather than drive through the covers. May have stopped on him too
fuller, on the stumps, clipped to long-on
full on middle stump, clipped to midwicket
flat, angling down leg, tucked away to long leg

flicked for six! Didn't middle it, but got enough on it to clear the midwicket boundary and hit it far enough to the right of deep square leg. The angle, from round the wicket, and the full length, enabled that shot

he's been expensive today, but he's picked up a second wicket. Or has he? They're checking for no-ball, and it looks like he has juuuust enough heel behind the line. A good ball, on a good length, wide enough outside off to invite the drive away from the body, and then straightens just a wee bit to kiss the outside edge
greets him, predictably, with a bouncer, but the line is well down the leg side
another bouncer, again down the leg side, and Hasaranga just watches it and lets it go through to the keeper
back of a length close to off stump, defended into the point region

another bouncer, this one doesn't quite slide down leg, but it bounced pretty high. The square-leg umpire gives it the benefit of doubt. Definitely welt over shoulder height, and maybe over head height too, as Hasaranga semi-ducked under it
back of a length outside off, dabbed to backward point
back of a length outside off, straightens slightly. Watches it well and guides it down to third man

flat, back of a length, slides on towards off stump, makes himself room and stabs to the right of backward point. Looks like a bit of a mix-up, and Hasaranga is slow getting to the keeper's end, but he's home by the time Dhoni gets the bails off
back of a length, angling into leg stump, tucked into the square leg region
tossed up outside off, driven to extra-cover
fullish on off stump, pushed inside-out to the left of extra-cover
length ball outside off, pushed into the cover region off the front foot. Backward point moves quickly to deny him the single
back of a length, close to off stump, punched to sweeper cover
back of a length, close to off stump, lets it come on and defends towards backward point
length ball, slightly wider, plays nice and late in defence, bounces to the fielder at wide slip
bouncer, climbs steeply above the right shoulder, and he miscontrols his hook. Goes high in the air, over backward square leg, but falls safely beyond square leg turning around and chasing back
short, a bit of width, cut away to the right of third man to bring up his 34th ODI fifty
length ball close to off stump, gets on the front foot to push to the left of mid-off
down the track, and that's heaved away. Gets it in his slot, fullish on off stump, and he clears his front leg and cross-bats it along the ground, to the left of mid-on
flat, angling into off stump, gets down low and clears his front leg to slog-sweep over midwicket. One bounce and over the rope
back of a length, sliding on towards middle stump. Makes room and chops into the point region
length ball wide of off, driven to sweeper cover
full on off stump, driven to long-off
goes back to a length ball on off stump, defends into the covers
full on off stump, angled in from wide of the crease. Makes a bit of room and jabs to extra-cover
back of a length close to off stump, lets it come on and dabs to backward point
dug in short, wide of off. Too wide to pull, and he ends up hitting it back towards the bowler, on the bounce
down the track and Thakur responds with the bouncer. Can't connect with the tennis-style swat
length ball close to off stump, punched down the ground, past the bowler towards mid-on
bouncer over off stump, pulled to the left of long leg
back of a length, close to off stump, dabbed into the short third man region
slider on off stump, chopped to short third man
too much flight and he's played the slog sweep to perfection. One bounce into the midwicket boundary. Fetched it from outside off but there was no turn, so it wasn't all that risky
steps out and swipes this back over Axar's head, smashes into the sightscreen. Saw the ball fired wide, got closer to the ball and smashed this away
driven through the line to deep cover
into the gap at wide long-on. Too predictable from Axar. Fired full and wide, right in the slot for the slog sweep. Hit right off the middle

he's out by a distance. This was hit towards mid-on, Hasaranga was far too down looking for a non-existent single, turned just as Bumrah ran in quickly and fired the throw. Even then, the run-out wasn't a guarantee. But Axar did well to stop the rocket throw and deflect the ball onto the stumps. It wasn't even his call.
short ball angling away, watched through to the keeper
Ducks under a skiddy bouncer angling away
places this short of length delivery into the gap at cover to get off the mark
right back into the crease as he fends this short ball with soft hands
back of a length on off stump, tucked away towards deep square leg. Took some time getting to the fielder, and they run two
back of a length close to off stump, defended back to the bowler
steers this short delivery towards short third man
tossed up on middle and leg, turned to midwicket
leans forward and eases this down to long-on
fired into the pads, nurdled to Bumrah at square leg
slapped into the deep cover region, made room and played that with a horizontal bat
gets forward and plays this straight to the cover fielder
sees the batsman backing away and fires this wide, just gets it outside the wide line. It was a slower delivery
punches this length ball on off to Kohli at cover. Knuckleball this time
steps out and slices this short of length delivery over cover. The bat-face turned in his hand, so didn't entirely get control of that.
worked off his hip to deep square leg
play and a miss. Length ball angling away, looked to blast that through cover
can't put this full toss away. Angling away again, looked to steer this wide of point but was late on the shot
beaten on the drive. Not much feet movement, just throwing his bat that that half-volley. A slightly better batsman would rue missing out on a boundary ball
swept fiercely into the square leg boundary. Fired in again, fired away by Mathews. Did well to get outside the line of the stumps and put that away

reward finally, but not before he's been carted to all corners of the park. Axar does well too, tosses this up nicely, bows it much wider too, which meant Mathews had to reach out to slog this across the line, he tried to but ended up getting a toe-end of the bat as short third man gobbled up the top edge. Axar's reaction tells you he's had a bad day and not even the wicket of a quality batsman is some balm.
drifts in a full ball on off stump, defended
that's more like it. Tossed up just outside off, held its line, defended off a thick inside edge
driven firmly past the diving cover fielder for an easy single
squeezes this full delivery into the gap between cover and point
tossed up, drifting into middle, played back to the bowler
Kuldeep doesn't gather the ball cleanly at the non-striker's end, run out missed. Excellent work by Pandey at square leg as he played a half-pull. Dananjaya was blindly running.
lunges forward and blocks
lobs off the pad to Dhoni, who runs in a few paces to take the catch. Stifled appeal, but Dhoni was just having fun
beaten by a wrong'un. He had no clue. Played for the one that comes on, this one went away
makes room and cuts this straight to point
slants a length ball across the left-hander, punched to deep poin
spears in a yorker-lenfgth delivery that hits him on the pad but was drifting down leg. Would've missed a fourth stump too.
hits the pad, but this didn't do enough to come back. Pushpakumara was playing a shot, so can't be given out. This was a length ball just outside off.
looks for a yorker, slips in a full toss, worked to square leg
sways out of the way of that short ball. This was angled in towards the body
thick inside edge to square leg.
tossed up on middle, defended off the backfoot
squeezes a drive to point
rocks back and cuts this short delivery to deep point
swept uppishly but straight to square leg
wrong'un on middle, squeezed back to the bowler
too short, he makes room and crunches this into the gap at cover. Work for KL Rahul and he is up to the task
fends this skiddy bouncer towards square leg

helped to third man. This was a short ball, not a very threatening one though. Milinda swayed inside the line of the delivery and simply directed this straight to Hardik Pandya. As easy as they come. The end is near.
that is a rip roaring bouncer. Snaking in towards his arm pit, Fernando was ducking for cover, awkwardly hit on bat handle. Ball lobs wide of Dhoni
swing and a miss. Looked to play a flat-batted pull but the ball got too big on him
slaps this past the bowler. Looks like he expended all his energy behind that. He must have a sore shoulder. The ball just trickles past the boundary
swung away towards deep midwicket. Dhawan runs across from mid-on to cut that off. Didn't get hold of it
tossed up outside off and bang. Got right to the pitch of the ball and belted this over the infield
worked with the spin to square leg
simple return catch. Kuldeep has deceived him in flight. Fernando looked for a big, booming drive but could only hit it back off a thick inside edge.

got him with a big spinning delivery. Landed this just outside off, Malinga went for a big swipe, but could only connect with the humid evening air. Nowhere near the pitch of the ball and lost his middle stump. The plug has been pulled finally. This is Sri Lanka's biggest defeat at home in terms of runs.
